title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Generative AI excellence: How AWS Partners help customers from strategy to scale
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI卓越实践：AWS合作伙伴如何帮助客户从战略到规模化
abstract: How AWS Partners and customers are working together to address generative AI adoption. We present generative AI industry research with insights into customer buying behavior and how partners are uniquely positioned to address.   Additionally, we cover insights on the AWS Partner Programs and resources designed to make both partners and customers successful in achieving their desired outcomes with generative AI.
abstract_cn: AWS 合作伙伴和客户如何共同应对生成式 AI 的采用。我们展示生成式 AI 行业研究，深入分析客户购买行为以及合作伙伴如何独特地定位以应对这些需求。此外，我们还介绍了 AWS 合作伙伴计划和资源的见解，这些计划和资源旨在帮助合作伙伴和客户成功实现他们在生成式 AI 方面的预期成果。

presenter.name: Chris Dally
presenter.title: WW Head, AWS AI Competency Partners
